name: Through the Dark (Velvary)
description:
"Through the Dark" is a short atmospheric platformer-like game, where you try to rescue a little boy who felt down a hole. He is accompanied by his little bird friend, which can be controlled, too. 

Will you be able to find a way back to the  surface? 

---

This game was developed during the seven days Brackeys Game jam 2021.1.

---
